Description: Green glazed composition cosmetic-vessel, in the form of hedgehog with human head on back.
Curator's comments: Published: Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt, Japan 1999-2000, [41]. Webb, V. Archaic Greek Faience, 134 (937) pl. XXII. D. Antoine and M. Vandenbeusch, Egyptian mummies. Exploring ancient lives, Sydney 2016, pp. 132-3.
Bibliographic references: Webb 1978 / Archaic Greek Faience, Miniature scent bottles and related objects from East Greece, 650-500BC (937)
